rooms.name: Mini Dreamy Room
rooms.desc: Spacious and comfortable, this modern furnished room offers a queen-size bed and breathtaking views.

rooms.name: Sweet Bungalow
rooms.desc: Spacious and comfortable, this modern furnished room offers a queen-size bed and breathtaking views.

rooms.name: Los Cocos Suite
rooms.desc: If you want a little extra from your stay, you might like our superior rooms. With double doors opening onto a private terrace, you will enjoy spectacular views of our pristine beach.

rooms.name: Summer Coco
rooms.desc: For large groups of friends or families to enjoy spectacular views of our pristine beach.

selectedServices.name: Surf classes
selectedServices.desc: Learn the basics of surfing in our incredible bay. For only $25 per hour you will have such a great time in family and will learn a fun activity.

selectedServices.name: Special dinner
selectedServices.desc: In Los Cocos Bungalows we know how to make a special day bright and unforgetable. Enjoy a dinner for 2 in our lovely Greeny Restaurant for an additional $45 per couple.

selectedServices.name: Horse Riding
selectedServices.desc: Gallop through the gorgeous greenery of one of Catalonia's most majestic natural parks on a half-day horse-riding tour from Barcelona.

services.name: Best Museums
